data.title: Kevin M Smith
data.text:
Publications

Publications: 750 publications (as of 1/1/2015).

h-Index 74; 630 citations in 2014.

Thomson-Reuters ISI Highly Cited researcher, 2000-present.

Books (edited): 57, including 20 volumes of "The Porphyrin Handbook" and 35 volumes of "The Handbook of Porphyrin Science" (HPS). An additional 10 volumes of HPS are contracted for 2015-2016.

Patents: 8
